== Chalakkal (627814) ==

Chalakkal is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 639 hectares and harbouring 667 households with total population of 2938 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 1402 and female population is 1536. Scheduled Caste Population is 509 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 627814<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
